content: The "StartUp Visa Act of 2010" may be cited as the StartUp Visa Act. It pertains to startup visas. The StartUp Visa Act of 2010 introduces StartUp visas for qualified immigrant entrepreneurs who receive investments of at least $100,000 from venture capitalists or super angel investors. These entrepreneurs must create a minimum of 5 new full-time jobs in the US within a 2-year period.
